name: Paradigma Digital
tagline: Be Different is not Enough, We want to be Unique
description:
Being different is never enough, we want to be unique: Paradigma is a no-company.
In a no-company the company doesn't matter, it is only the means to get passionate people to work together and find innovative ways to make the world a better place.
We combine talent and technology with a unique corporate culture to reinvent the digital future of the biggest companies. We are always at the cutting edge of technology, methodology and business innovation.

locations.address: Vía de las dos Castillas, 33 Ática 4, 2ª Planta
